subject: Career
title: Cross-Functional Relationships
description: A short lesson to help you apply Cross-Functional Relationships.

hook.text: The engineer who knows the sales team. The marketer who understands finance. Cross-functional people are gold.

buildup.text: Organizations are siloed by design. Information flows vertically within teams, not horizontally across them.

discovery.text: People who bridge silos see the full picture. They spot opportunities and solve problems others can't.

twist.text: Cross-functional work is often unrewarded in formal reviews â€” but it's the #1 factor in leadership selection.

climax.text: Volunteer for cross-functional projects. Attend other teams' demos. Learn their language.

punchline.text: The view from between teams is the leadership view.

quiz.question: Why are cross-functional relationships valuable for career growth?
options: They provide the full-picture view needed for leadership
They look good on a resume
